Package io.github.shooter.multiplayer

Class GameClient

java.lang.Object
io.github.shooter.multiplayer.GameClient
public class GameClient extends Object
Handles client-side connection to game server, sending and receiving multiplayer data.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    GameClient.PlayerData
    Stores data and state about another player in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameClient

      public GameClient(String serverAddress) throws IOException
      Connects to server at given address with messages shown by default. The show messages parameter was really for a finished game where you don't want the user to see the info in the console but in a more intuitive way.
      Parameters:
      serverAddress - IP or hostname of server to connect to
      Throws:
      IOException - if connection fails

    • GameClient

      public GameClient(String serverAddress, boolean showMessages) throws IOException
      Connects to server at given address.
      Parameters:
      serverAddress - IP or hostname of server to connect to
      showMessages - if true, prints connection info to console
      Throws:
      IOException - if connection fails

  • Method Details

    • getClientId

      public int getClientId()
      Returns this client's network ID.

    • getClient

      public com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Client getClient()
      Returns the Kryonet client object.

    • sendPlayerUpdate

      public void sendPlayerUpdate(float x, float y, float health, boolean alive, float rotation, String username, int kills)
      Sends player's position, health, rotation, username, and kills to server.

    • sendBulletShot

      public void sendBulletShot(float x, float y, float dirX, float dirY, float damage)
      Sends bullet shot info to server.

    • sendPlayerHit

      public void sendPlayerHit(int targetId, float damage)
      Sends info about hitting another player. Fatal hits are when a player dies.

    • updateOtherPlayer

      public void updateOtherPlayer(int playerId, float x, float y, float health, boolean alive, float rotation, String username, int kills)
      Updates or adds info about another player.

      public void close()
      Closes client connection and disposes enemy players

    • updatePing

      public void updatePing()
      Sends ping request every second to measure latency.
